Articles.Content:
I've played Elder Scrolls Online, and there is a very nice addon manager called Minion (also works on WoW).

Is there a similar mod manager for KSP?  I see the mod repository is on Curse.

There's CKAN, but not every mod is supported by it.  I tried it and found it cumbersome.  It's insanely easy to install mods manually.

I also primarily use Spacedock to download mods.
That would be CKAN. And although Curse is the official mod repository, there is the community run website Spacedock which has quite the number of mods itself.

For a semi-automatic mod manager, theres KSP ModAdmin

Also, look at KSP AVC as a "mod update notification service", if you install manually vs CKAN

Also, an easy way to get mod links for installing manually, is KSP Mod Analyzer

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

(And folks, if you see a thread that seems to you to be in the wrong place... just report it, please, with an appropriate note.  That'll get the moderators' attention so we can take any appropriate action.  Please don't tell people, in-thread, "this should be in <place>."  That's unhelpful, because it doesn't get the moderators' attention.  Also, publicly telling other people what to do rarely ends well.)
